mods.name: SexLab
mods.description: Skyrim SexLab is intended to serve as a unifying resource for modders to pull animations from to aid them in development of adult themed mods

mods.name: SkyUI
mods.description: SkyUI is a mod that aims to improve Skyrim's User Interface by making it easier to use with mouse and keyboard, less wasteful of available screen space, and nicer to look at

mods.name: SKSE
mods.description: The Skyrim Script Extender, or SKSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Skyrim. It does so without modifying the executable files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects

mods.name: FNIS
mods.description: Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS Behaviors allows other mods to add different types of animations to the game: idles/poses, sequenced, arm offset, furniture, and paired animations, killmoves, and creature animations

mods.name: UIExtensions
mods.description: This mod adds several custom menus meant for modder and user use

mods.name: FNIS-creature
mods.description: Fores New Idles in Skyrim - Creature Pack

mods.name: UnofficialSkyrimPatch
mods.description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, the goal of the Unofficial Skyrim Patch (aka USKP) is to eventually fix every bug with Skyrim not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.

mods.name: Defeat
mods.description: Defeat aim to give more combat outcomes and alternatives to death, whether the player is the victim, the aggressor or not even involved

mods.name: ZazAnimationPack
mods.description: The ZaZ Animation Pack is a Master Mod to so many Independent Mods on LoversLab

mods.name: ZazAnimationPack-textures
mods.description: The ZaZ Animation Pack is a Master Mod to so many Independent Mods on LoversLab. This contains the texture pack

mods.name: DeviousDevices-integration
mods.description: Devious Devices - Assets Integration

mods.name: DeviousDevices
mods.description: This is a collection of BDSM-themed gear and devices for the CBBE 3.2.3 (Curvy) & UNP v1.2 female body, with additional tweaks for the UNP v1.2 (Skinny) body and UNP HDT-PE-TBBP 5.01 body included

mods.name: DeviousDevices-expansion
mods.description: DDx is an add-on content pack for the Devious Devices family of mods, it's purpose, outside of adding more content for us all to play with, is largely as a framework

mods.name: CBBE
mods.description: This is a Skyrim body replacer that replaces the base female body with one that is a little more curvaceous

mods.name: SexLabAroused
mods.description: The mod is sub-framework for SexLab that adds simple model of sexual needs to Skyrim

mods.name: QuickAsYouLike
mods.description: Quick As You Like is a cross-country survival mod with elements of player slavery, and humilation

mods.name: SlaveTats
mods.description: The tattoo toolkit for Skyrim

mods.name: RaceMenu
mods.description: The RaceMenu was redesigned with the intention of using SKSE to allow for more in-depth customization of your character

mods.name: JContainers
mods.description: JContainers is a modding framework that extends Papyrus by implemented basic data structures

mods.name: FuzRoDoh
mods.description: This mod basically enhances support for unvoiced in-game dialog

mods.name: DeathAlternative
mods.description: To offer a narrative of the player character's adventures that include defeat and failures, and increase the active role of the NPCs that populate Skyrim
mods.filename: Death Alternative - Your Money Or Your Life-45894-6-1-8.7z

mods.name: SDplus
mods.description: Sanguine Debauchery+ is a mod that subjects the player to enslavement as an alternative to death. Being enslaved by the opponents that defeat you in combat offers the player interesting story tangents and, above all, a continuous narrative in place of death and a reload screen

mods.name: SexLabDialogues
mods.description: SL Dialogues is a new companion resource for mods that need dialogues for relationships between the player and NPC

mods.name: XPMS
mods.description: XP32 Maximum Skeleton. A multi purpose skeleton for animation in skyrim. Include New skeleton structure

mods.name: RealisticForce
mods.description: Realistic Ragdolls and Force. Reduces the extra force applied on ragdolls to a more reasonable level and replaces ragdolls so that they bend and twist realistically and fall at a faster velocity. Increase friction to fix ice-like ragdoll sliding

mods.name: DeviouslyHelpless
mods.description: If enemies see you coming too close to them helpless, they'll just straight up rape you instead of even bothering to attack. This is based on what Devious devices you're wearing
